ygData.subject: RE: L16 - where to buy voice graft
ygData.msgSnippet: BUY IT!!!!  HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!! When your level 40 and camping a 20 minute spawn, you will have something to do.=) Goner_00 says Master... Manbik says Yes
ygData.messageBody:
BUY IT!!!! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!

When your level 40 and camping a 20 minute spawn, you will have something to
do.=)

Goner_00 says 'Master...'
Manbik says 'Yes Goner?'
Goner_00 says 'Am I satisfactory pet?'
Manbik says 'Yes, you are doing quite well tonight.'
Goner_00 says 'I wish only to do your bidding Master.'

Manbik Prodo'Lues
Gnome Necromancer (Tunare)

-----Original Message-----
From: Sh'evil D'Lloth - EA [mailto:shevil_necromancer@...]
Sent: Thursday, January 20, 2000 10:24 AM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] L16 - where to buy voice graft


From: Sh'evil D'Lloth - EA <shevil_necromancer@...>

Voice graph is worthless...

Was cool before they nerfed it way back... fun for
gags and such, but not anymore.

Save your money.

~S.

--- Mark Rafn <dagon@...> wrote:
> Woo - made L16, stopped in at Neriak (I'm a gnome,
> but figured they'd be
> more complete than Freeport) and bought 8 of my
> spells. I was told by
> someone that Voice Graft is available in some
> cities, but it's either on a
> vendor that won't talk to me (about 1/3 of them) or
> not there. Also
> checked Freeport Necro/SK guild with no luck.
>
> Can anyone provide a city that they know for certian
> carries this spell?
> Vendor name and location would be great, but knowing
> it's in the city is
> sufficient.
>
> Also, for the research-only spells, what's the best
> way to get the
> components? Do you just auction in every zone you
> enter? Is there
> normally a strong presence of people selling words
> at the Bazaar (this is
> Quellious, if it matters).
> --
> Mark Rafn dagon@...
> <http://www.dagon.net/> !G
>
>
